instructions: In an iMessage conversation, tap the Apple Pay button , then enter the amount. Tip: If there s an underlined monetary amount in a message, tap it to preset the payment. Tap Pay, add a comment if you want, then tap the Send button . Review the payment information. If you don t have sufficient funds in Apple Cash, you can pay the balance using your debit card in Wallet. Authenticate the payment with Face ID, Touch ID, or your passcode.
In an iMessage conversation, tap the Apple Pay button . Enter the amount, then tap Request.
